1100.bookName: The Basics of a Dawn Warrior

1412.bookName: Secret skill of the Night Walker

1000000.name: Improved HP Recovery
1000000.desc: [Master Level : 16]\nRecover additional HP every 10 seconds while standing still.

1000001.name: Improved MaxHP Increase
1000001.desc: Master Level : 10]\nThis skill boosts up the amount of increase on Max HP after each Level UP, or AP used on MaxHP.\nRequired Skill : #cAt least Level 5 on Improved HP Recovery.#
1000001.h1: If Level UP, +4 more; if AP applied, +3 more on top on MaxHP
1000001.h2: If Level UP, +8 more; if AP applied, +6 more on top on MaxHP
1000001.h3: If Level UP, +12 more; if AP applied, +9 more on top on MaxHP
1000001.h4: If Level UP, +16 more; if AP applied, +12 more on top on MaxHP
1000001.h5: If Level UP, +20 more; if AP applied, +15 more on top on MaxHP
1000001.h6: If Level UP, +24 more; if AP applied, +18 more on top on MaxHP
1000001.h7: If Level UP, +28 more; if AP applied, +21 more on top on MaxHP
1000001.h8: If Level UP, +32 more; if AP applied, +24 more on top on MaxHP
1000001.h9: If Level UP, +36 more; if AP applied, +27 more on top on MaxHP
1000001.h10: If Level UP, +40 more; if AP applied, +30 more on top on MaxHP

1000002.name: Endure
1000002.desc: [Master Level : 8]\nEven when hanging on the rope or on a ladder, you'll be able to recover some HP after a certain amount of time.\nRequired Skill : #cAt least Level 3 on Improved MaxHP Increase.#

1001003.name: Iron Body
1001003.desc: [Master Level : 20]\nTemporarily increases your Weapon Defense.\nRequired Skill : #cAt least Level 3 on Endure#

1001004.name: Power Strike
1001004.desc: [Master Level : 20]\nUse MP to deliver a killer blow to a single monster with a melee weapon.

1001005.name: Slash Blast
1001005.desc: [Master Level : 20]\nUse HP and MP to attack up to 6 enemies around you with a melee weapon.\nRequired Skill : #cAt least Level 1 on Power Strike#

1100000.name: Sword Mastery
1100000.desc: [Master Level : 20]\nIncreases the Mastery and Accuracy of Swords. It only applies when either a one-handed or a two-handed Sword is in hand.

1100001.name: Axe Mastery
1100001.desc: [Master Level : 20]\nIncreases the Mastery and Accuracy of Axes. It only applies when either a one-handed or a two-handed Axe is in hand.

2301002.desc: [Master Level : 30]\nRecovers the HP of all party members around the area. The amount of healing depends on the number of people being healed and the skill level. Certain Undead monsters in the vicinity of Heal will receive damage.

5211004.desc: [Master Level : 30]\nAttacks monsters nearby with a fire-based attack. The affected monster will keep receiving damage for a short period of time.

5211006.desc: [Master Level : 30]\nSends a parrot that'll mark a target on a monster. From then on out, all attacks will be focused on that monster.

5221004.name: Rapid Fire
5221004.desc: Fires rounds of bullets very quickly. Hold down the skill key for continued shooting.\nRequired Skill : #cLevel 20 on Burst Fire#

5221006.name: Battleship
5221006.desc:
Calls forth a ship that you can mount and launch attacks from. The durability of the ship decreases with damage received, and when it reaches 0, you will not be able to get back on board for a short period of time.
#cAvailable Skills# : Battleship skills, Grenades, Summons, Gun Booster, Elemental attacks.

5221007.name: Battleship Cannon
5221007.desc: Rapidly fires a number of cannonballs to strike a single enemy. Only available when aboard the Battleship.\nRequired Skill : #cAt least Level 1 on Battleship#\n

5221008.name: Battleship Torpedo
5221008.desc: Fires a hardened cannonball that goes through monsters. Only available when aboard the Battleship.\nRequired Skill : #cAt least Level 1 on Battleship#

8001000.name: Macro Test
8001000.desc: [Master Level : 1]\nExecute a Lie Detector to a character who uses Macro.

8001001.name: Teleport
8001001.desc: [Master Level : 1 ]\nAllows you to teleport to other locations on the same map using the arrow keys.

9001000.name: GM Haste (Normal)
9001000.h1: Moving Speed + 40, Jump + 20 for 30 Minutes (Only for self)

9001003.name: Bless
9001003.desc: [Master Level:1]\nIncreases all abilities of those around you for 15 minutes.
9001003.h1: Attack and Magic Ability +20, and other abilities +100 for 30 minutes.

9001008.name: Hyper Body
9001008.desc: [Master Level:1]\nMax HP, Max MP increases for 15 minutes.

9001009.name: ADMIN_ANTIMACRO
9001009.desc: [Master Level:1]\nActivate Lie Detector on the suspicious macro user.

9101003.name: GM Bless
9101003.h1: Attack & Magic Attack + 20, Waepon Def. Magic Def. Accuracy and Avoidability +100 for 30 Minutes

9101008.name: GM Hyper Body
9101008.desc: [Master Level : 1]\nIncrease the Max HP and Max MP for 30 mins.

0000008.name: Follow the Lead
0000008.desc: [Master Level : 1]\nAllows one to lead up to 3 pets at once. (Passive skill)

0001000.name: Three Snails
0001000.desc: [Master Level : 3]\nHurls snail shells to attack monsters from a long distance.

0001001.name: Recovery
0001001.desc: [Master Level : 3]\nEnables the user to recover HP constantly for 30 sec. \n#cTerms between skills : 10 min.#

0001003.name: Legendary Spirit
0001003.desc: [Master Level : 1]\nUses the spirit of a legend to use a scroll on an item that cannot be normally equipped by the character.

0001004.name: Monster Rider
0001004.desc: [Master Level : 1]\nEnables one to ride on a tamed monster and use it as a method of transportation.

0001002.name: Nimble Feet
0001002.desc: [Master Level : 3]\nEnables the character to move around quickly for a short amount of time. \n#cTerms between skills : 1 min.#

0001013.name: Spaceship
0001013.desc: [Master Level : 2]\nYou board a spaceship. While aboard, you can increase your movement and jump abilities by pressing the right/left direction key twice.
0001013.h1: Consumes 10 MP. Weapon and Magic Defense +10, Speed 150, Jump 120
0001013.h2: Consumes 10 MP. Weapon and Magic Defense +10, Speed 170, Jump 120

0001014.name: Space Dash
0001014.desc: [Master Level : 1]\nIncrease your movement and jump abilities by pressing the right/left direction key twice.

0001015.name: Space Beam
0001015.desc: [Master Level : 1]\nChanges the condition of the Krypto found at the Space Mine.

0001005.name: Echo of Hero
0001005.desc: [Master Level : 1]\nIncrease the Weapon Attack and Magic Attack of all players around.\n#cCooldown on skill: 2 hours#
0001005.h1: MP -30; Weapon attack +4%, Magic attack +4% for 40 Minutes

0001006.name: Jump Down
0001006.h1: Jump down to a lower level.

0001009.name: Bamboo Rain
0001009.desc: An attack using a bamboo stick.
0001009.h1: 30% reduction of the boss monster's strength

0001010.name: Invincibility
0001010.desc: You become invincible for a fixed amount of time.

0001011.name: Power Explosion
0001011.desc: Increased damage rate for a fixed amount of time.
0001011.h1: 100% increase of damage rate for 30 seconds

0000012.name: Blessing of the Fairy
0000012.desc: [Master Level : 20]\nSkill Point will increase by 1 when the related character reaches above Lv.10.

0001007.name: Maker
0001007.desc: [Master Level : 3]\nCan create item by using alchemy.  Items that can be created will vary depending on your Character level.
0001007.h1: Able to create items under level 75.
0001007.h2: Able to create items under level 105.
0001007.h3: Able to create items under level 135.

0001020.name: Rage of Pharaoh
0001020.desc: [Master Level : 1]\nUtilizes the rage of Pharaoh as an attack.
0001020.h1: Eliminates all monsters inside the Pyramid with a single blow.

0001017.name: Yeti Rider
0001017.desc: [Master Level : 1]\nAllows one to ride on a Yeti.\n#cAvailable until : 7/9/2009 at 00:00#
0001017.h1: MP -10; Weapon and Magic DEF +10, Speed +120, Jump +120

0001018.name: Yeti Mount
0001018.desc: [Master Level : 1]\nAllows you to move around while being mounted on a Yeti.
0001018.h1: Consumes 10 MP, Weapon and Magic Defense +10, Speed 120, Jump 120

0001019.name: Witch's Broomstick
0001019.desc: [Master Level : 1]\nAllows you to move around while being mounted on a Broomstick.
0001019.h1: Consumes 10 MP, Weapon and Magic Defense +10, Speed 120, Jump 120

0001031.name: Barlog Mount
0001031.desc: [Master Level : 1]\nAllows you to move around while being mounted on a Barlog.
0001031.h1: Consumes 10 MP, Weapon and Magic Defense +10, Speed 120, Jump 120
